alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 4:37PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier, Hendry and Glades Counties through 515 PM EST... At 436 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmdale to near Big Corkscrew Island. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Montura, Immokalee, Palmdale, Buckhead Ridge, Ave Maria, Felda, Port La Belle, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, Ortona, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lake Hicpochee, Bunker Hill, Harlem, and Keri. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
